title: Mobile Suit Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz
synopsis: In the year After Colony 196, one year after the conclusion of the intergalactic civil war, a state of stasis prevails over the Earth and its colonies. Seeing no further use for their Gundam mobile suits, war heroes Duo Maxwell, Heero Yuy, Trowa Barton, and Quatre Raberba Winner decide to destroy these weapons by launching them into the sun's surface.
related_anime: ['Mobile Suit Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz Special', 'Shin Kidou Senki Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz', 'Mobile Suit Gundam Wing', 'SD Gundam Gaiden']
